name.en_GB: Free QR Code Generator for Current Page
name.fil: Generate QR Code for Current Page
name.fr: Generate QR Code for Current Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One click converts your current webpage URL into QR code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e:
Generate QR code for current page, no remote request.

Thanks to https://github.com/davidshimjs/qrcodejs
long.en,en_AU:
Transform any webpage into a shareable QR code with a single click. QR Code Generator is a streamlined Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience.

Key Features:
• Instant QR code generation for current webpage
• One-click functionality
• Easy sharing across devices
• Seamless mobile-desktop integration

Let you efficiently transfer web content between devices. Simplify your workflow and boost productivity with QR Code Generator.
